Name: Swap Sides
Ingredients: Amber Shard - 1 | Peppermint Leaves  - 1 | Dawn Dew - 1 | Scarlet Pimpernels  - 1 | Dew Drops - 3
Description: Switches between two sides of a tile

Name: Joker
Ingredients: Amethyst - 1 | Jade Shard - 1 | Amber Shard - 1 | Moon Dust - 1 | Dew Drops - 5
Description: Turns a tile into a joker tile that matches everything

Name: Tile Bomb
Ingredients: Sapphire Shard - 1 | Feverfew - 1 | Dandelion Root - 1 |  Scarlet Pimpernels - 1 | Dew Drops - 5
Description: Removes a slice from the ring

Name: Slice Bomb
Ingredients: Wax - 1 | Nettle Tears - 1 | Vervain Blossom - 1 | Peppermint Leaves - 1 |  Dew Drops - 4
Description: Removes a tile placed in the ring
